PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-06832010-05-27,  ,  NRCAN,  NEB,  , 
ActNational Energy Board Act
SubjectAmending Order AO-3-GC-3 (Variance of National Energy Board Certificate GC-3)
PrecisOrder amending the Certificate of Public Convenience and Necessity No. GC-3, issued to Canadian-Montana Pipe Line Corporation, to authorize the change in the name of the owner and operator of the Aden Pipeline from EnCana Border Pipelines Limited to CENOVUS BORDER PIPELINES LIMITED.
AttachmentsAttachment
